title: common
description: Common schema fields for all WMF schemas

$schema.description: The URI identifying the jsonschema for this event. This should be a short uri containing only the name and revision at the end of the URI path.  e.g. /schema_name/1.0.0 is acceptable. This often will (and should) match the schema's $id field.

uri.description: the unique URI identifying the event / resource

request_id.description: The unique ID of the request that caused the event.

id.description: the unique ID of this event.

dt.description: the time stamp of the event, in ISO8601 format

domain.description: the domain the event pertains to

stream.description: The name of the stream/queue that this event belongs in.
